content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||2em||false|false” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font_size=”22px” header_2_line_height=”1.4em” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

We’re thrilled to be heading to the 5* Super Boutique Londoner Hotel, London. Located in the heart of Leicester Square. A perfectly engineered collection of spaces, tastes and textures brought to life over 16 storeys on London’s legendary Leicester Square.

Enjoy drinks and networking with friends old and new, before being taken through to dinner in the Ballroom prepared by London’s top culinary masters. With industry CEOs, major advertisers and media owners, it promises to be an exceptional evening of who’s who of influencer marketing.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”1em||||false|false” border_width_top=”1px” border_color_top=”#666666″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

LOCATION
38 Leicester Square, London, WC2H 7DX

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”1em||||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ border_width_top=”1px” border_color_top=”#666666″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content” sticky_enabled=”0″]

UNDERGROUND STATIONS

Leicester Square – 5 minute walk

Piccadilly – 5 minute walk

Charing Cross – 7 minute walk

Covent Garden – 8 minutes

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content” locked=”on”][et_pb_fullwidth_code _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content” sticky_enabled=”0″ locked=”on”][/et_pb_fullwidth_code][/et_pb_section]
